explanation: Felix claims he took the subway home to Greenfield at 8 PM on a Wednesday. But Clue 3 reveals the Greenfield subway line shuts down every Wednesday at 7 PM for maintenance. funFact: Corporate espionage costs businesses an estimated $600 billion per year, and physical prototypes are among the most commonly targeted assets.
